subject: Football (College)
lead_paragraph: The Savannah State football team will be the underdog by more than 50 points to Oklahoma State and Florida State in its first two games of the season, but payments will total $860,000.
snippet: The Savannah State football team will be the underdog by more than 50 points to Oklahoma State and Florida State in its first two games of the season, but payments will total $860,000.
